import Mathlib

/-- Let (x_n) be a convergent monotone sequence. Suppose there exists k such that
    lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} x_n = x_k. Then x_n = x_k for all n ‚â• k. -/
theorem monotone_seq_eventually_const_of_tendsto_eq_term
  {Œ± : Type*} [LinearOrder Œ±] [TopologicalSpace Œ±] [OrderTopology Œ±]
  {x : ‚Ñï ‚Üí Œ±} {k : ‚Ñï}
  (hmono : Monotone x ‚à® Antitone x)
  (hlim : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù (x k))) :
  ‚àÄ n, n ‚â• k ‚Üí x n = x k := by sorry
